duration_raw: until the end of the current turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Agile Feet](/Spells.aspx?ID=399)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 389 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of the current turn
</row>

</column>

---

The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed and ignore difficult terrain. As part of casting _agile feet_, you can Stride or Step; you can instead Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim if you have the appropriate Speed.
name: Agile Feet

summary_markdown: The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid.
text: Agile Feet Source Core Rulebook pg. 389 4.0 Domain Travel Cast Single Action somatic Duration until the end of the current turn --- The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed and ignore difficult terrain. As part of casting agile feet , you can Stride or Step; you can instead Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim if you have the appropriate Speed.
